title: 5×5 笑脸
story: 用 5×5 的像素重新绘制一张笑脸迎接旅人。

starter.code:
canvas = [[0] * 5 for _ in range(5)]
canvas[0][1:4] = [1, 1, 1]
canvas[1][0] = canvas[1][4] = 1
canvas[3][0] = canvas[3][4] = 1
canvas[4][1:4] = [1, 1, 1]
for row in canvas:
    print(''.join(str(cell) for cell in row))

solution:
canvas = [[0] * 5 for _ in range(5)]
canvas[0][1:4] = [1, 1, 1]
canvas[1][0] = canvas[1][4] = 1
canvas[3][0] = canvas[3][4] = 1
canvas[4][1:4] = [1, 1, 1]
for row in canvas:
    print(''.join(str(cell) for cell in row))
hints: 可以用二维列表保存像素
打印前先把每行 join 成字符串
